{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Google |model=Home |revision=Max (H0B) |price=400 |est_release_date=11/2017 |fcc_date=11/13/2017 |is_manuf=No |type=wireless speakers, media streamer, IoT hub |fcc_id=A4R-H0B |ic_id=10395A-H0B |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1.85 |pwr_conn=AC |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88DE3218;Synaptics, BG4CT, (Armada 1500 Ultra); |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8887 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |flags=Bluetooth 4.2 LE, DFS, Audio in (3.5mm), Microphone, Speaker |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Smart Speaker}} :{{ProductPage|https://store.google.com/product/google_home_max}}
Mic-mute switch, Power jack, USB-C port and 3.5mm Audio input. <!-- :It's not clear what the USB-C port is meant for aside from charging your smartphone. :Update! Google says you can add a USB-C ethernet adapter for faster internet. -->
*FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/A4R-H0B A4R-H0B] (2017-11-13) - Multimedia Device :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88DE3218 ([[Synaptics]] BG4CT) @1.5GHz ::Quad Core ARM Cortex-A53 (Armada 1500 Ultra)
{{FCC ST|04/29/2018|indexme.}}
